languages.text: "Ты тоже отдохни, {name}. И запомни — на охоту лучше отправляться бодрым, но слегка голодным. Голод... он добавляет остроты. Делает убийства более пьянящими, понимаешь?"

traits.locale_text: "Ты тоже отдохни, {name}. И запомни — на охоту лучше отправляться бодрым, но слегка голодным. Голод... он добавляет остроты. Делает убийства более пьянящими, понимаешь?"
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: "You should get some rest as well, {name}. And remember, it is better to go hunting when you are full of vigour, but slightly hungry. The hunger... adds acuity. Makes the kill more intoxicating, you know?"
languages.original_text: "Ты тоже отдохни, {name}. И запомни — на охоту лучше отправляться бодрым, но слегка голодным. Голод... он добавляет остроты. Делает убийства более пьянящими, понимаешь?"

traits.locale_text: "You should get some rest as well, {name} And remember — it's better to go hunting when you are well-rested, yet a bit hungry. The hunger... it adds acuity. Makes the killings more intoxicating, you know?"
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

traits.locale_text: "You should get some rest as well, {name} And remember — it's better to go hunting when you are well-rested, yet a bit hungry. The hunger... it adds acuity. Makes the killings more intoxicating, you know?"
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

traits.locale_text: "You should get some rest as well, {name} And remember — it's better to go hunting when you are well-rested, yet a bit hungry. The hunger... adds acuity. Makes the killings more intoxicating, you know?"
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

traits.locale_text: "You should get some rest as well, {name} And remember — it's better to go hunting when you are well-rested, yet a bit hungry. The hunger... adds acuity. Makes the killings more intoxicating, you know?"
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

traits.locale_text: "You should get some rest as well, {name}. And remember, it is better to go hunting when you are full of vigour, but slightly hungry. The hunger... adds acuity. Makes the kill more intoxicating, you know?"
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

traits.locale_text: "You should get some rest as well, {name}. And remember, it is better to go hunting when you are full of vigour, but slightly hungry. The hunger... adds acuity. Makes the kill more intoxicating, you know?"
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: «Usted también debería descansar, {name}. Y recuerde: es mejor salir de caza con fuerzas repuestas pero con un poco de hambre. El hambre... agudiza el ingenio y hace que abatir a las presas resulte embriagador, ¿sabe?».
languages.original_text: "You should get some rest as well, {name}. And remember, it is better to go hunting when you are full of vigour, but slightly hungry. The hunger... adds acuity. Makes the kill more intoxicating, you know?"

traits.locale_text: «Usted también debería descansar, {name}. Y recuerde: es mejor salir de caza con el cuerpo descansado y el estómago vacío. El hambre... agudiza el ingenio y hace que abatir a las presas resulte embriagador, ¿sabe?».
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: “你也应该好好休息休息，{name}。记住，当你充满活力，但肚子却有点饿的时候，便是狩猎的最佳时刻。饥饿……可以让感官更加敏锐，你知道吗？这可以让杀戮变得更加令人陶醉。”
languages.original_text: "You should get some rest as well, {name}. And remember, it is better to go hunting when you are full of vigour, but slightly hungry. The hunger... adds acuity. Makes the kill more intoxicating, you know?"

traits.locale_text: “你也应该好好休息休息，{name}。记住，当你刚刚休息好，但肚子却有点饿，这种时候最适合进行狩猎。饥饿……可以让感官更加敏锐，你知道吗？这可以让杀戮变得更加令人陶醉。”
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: « Vous devriez vous reposer aussi, {name}. Et n'oubliez pas : il vaut toujours mieux chasser après un repas léger. La faim... aiguise les sens, elle rend la mise à mort plus enivrante, vous voyez ? »
languages.original_text: "You should get some rest as well, {name}. And remember, it is better to go hunting when you are full of vigour, but slightly hungry. The hunger... adds acuity. Makes the kill more intoxicating, you know?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous devriez vous reposer aussi, {name}. Et n'oubliez pas : il vaut toujours mieux chasser après une bonne nuit de sommeil et un repas léger. La faim... aiguise les sens, elle rend la mise à mort plus enivrante, vous voyez ? »
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: 「少し休息を取るべきだ、{name}。覚えておけ…狩りに行くのは、元気いっぱいだが、なおかつ少し空腹なときがいい。空腹は…鋭さを増してくれる。殺しにもっと酔えるようになるのさ。わかったか？」
languages.original_text: "You should get some rest as well, {name}. And remember, it is better to go hunting when you are full of vigour, but slightly hungry. The hunger... adds acuity. Makes the kill more intoxicating, you know?"

traits.locale_text: 「少し休息を取るべきだ、{name}。覚えておけ…狩りに行くのは、元気いっぱいだが、なおかつ少し空腹なときがいい。空腹は…鋭さを増してくれる。殺しにもっと酔えるようになるのさ。わかったか？」
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: "Ihr solltet Euch auch ausruhen, {name}. Und denkt daran: Am besten geht man jagen, wenn man gut ausgeruht, aber ein klein wenig hungrig ist. Der Hunger ... schärft die Sinne. Er macht das Töten berauschender, wisst Ihr?"
languages.original_text: "You should get some rest as well, {name}. And remember, it is better to go hunting when you are full of vigour, but slightly hungry. The hunger... adds acuity. Makes the kill more intoxicating, you know?"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr solltet Euch auch ausruhen, {name}. Und denkt daran: Am besten geht man jagen, wenn man gut ausgeruht, aber ein klein wenig hungrig ist. Der Hunger ... schärft die Sinne. Er macht das Töten berauschender, wisst Ihr?"
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: "Sen de biraz dinlenmelisin {name}. Ayrıca şunu unutma, ava çıkarken enerji dolu ama birazcık aç olmak daha iyidir. Açlık... Duyularına keskinlik katar. Öldürmek seni daha da mest eder, anladın sen."
languages.original_text: "You should get some rest as well, {name}. And remember, it is better to go hunting when you are full of vigour, but slightly hungry. The hunger... adds acuity. Makes the kill more intoxicating, you know?"
